languages.text: {n}Голос Лорд-инквизитора становится вкрадчив и сух:{/n} "А я вас не прошу. Я — велю. Мне уже некогда играть с вами в игры гордости и тщеславия".
{n}The Lord Inquisitor replies in a soft, arid voice,{/n} "But it is not a request. It is a command. And I am far past the point of humouring your pride and vanity."
languages.original_text: {n}Голос Лорд-инквизитора становится вкрадчив и сух:{/n} "А я вас не прошу. Я — велю. Мне уже некогда играть с вами в игры гордости и тщеславия".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor replies in a soft, arid voice,{/n} "But it is not a request. It is a command. And I am far past the point of humouring your pride and vanity."
{n}The Lord Inquisitor replies in a soft, arid voice,{/n} "But it is not a request. It is a command. And I am far past the point of humouring your pride and vanity."
{n}The Lord Inquisitor replies in a soft, arid voice,{/n} "But it is not a request. It is a command. And I am far past the point of humouring your pride and vanity."
{n}The Lord Inquisitor replies in a soft, arid voice,{/n} "But it is not a request. It is a command. And I am far past the point of humouring your pride and vanity."

languages.text: {n}大审判官以柔和而干涩的声音回答道。{/n}“然而，这并不是请求，而是命令。我已经没有耐心迁就你的傲慢与虚荣了。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor replies in a soft, arid voice,{/n} "But it is not a request. It is a command. And I am far past the point of humouring your pride and vanity."

traits.locale_text: {n}审判长以柔和而干涩的声音回答道。{/n}“然而，这并不是请求，而是命令。我已经没有耐心迁就你的傲慢与虚荣了。”

languages.text: {n}El Lord Inquisidor responde con voz suave y árida.{/n} «Y yo me temo que no es una petición, sino una orden. No tengo tiempo para atender a su orgullo y su vanidad».
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor replies in a soft, arid voice,{/n} "But it is not a request. It is a command. And I am far past the point of humouring your pride and vanity."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Lord Inquisidor responde con voz suave y árida.{/n} «Y yo me temo que no es una petición, sino una orden. No tengo tiempo para atender a su orgullo y su vanidad».

languages.text: {n}ロード・インクィジターは柔らかく、乾いた声で答える。{/n}「だが、これは要請ではない。命令だ。お前のプライドと虚栄心を満たしてやる時間は終いだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor replies in a soft, arid voice,{/n} "But it is not a request. It is a command. And I am far past the point of humouring your pride and vanity."

traits.locale_text: {n}ロード・インクィジターは柔らかく、乾いた声で答える。{/n}「だが、これは要請ではない。命令だ。お前のプライドと虚栄心を満たしてやる時間は終いだ」

languages.text: {n}Le seigneur inquisiteur répond d'une voix sèche, sans hausser le ton :{/n} « Mais je ne vous demandais pas votre avis. Il s'agit d'un ordre, et je ne suis vraiment pas d'humeur à tolérer votre fierté et votre orgueil. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor replies in a soft, arid voice,{/n} "But it is not a request. It is a command. And I am far past the point of humouring your pride and vanity."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le seigneur inquisiteur répond d'une voix sèche, sans hausser le ton :{/n} « Mais je ne vous demandais pas votre avis. Il s'agit d'un ordre, et je ne suis vraiment pas d'humeur à tolérer votre fierté et votre orgueil. »

languages.text: {n}Der Großinquisitor antwortet mit sanfter, freudloser Stimme:{/n} "Aber das war keine Bitte. Es war ein Befehl. Und Euren Hochmut und Eure Eitelkeit berücksichtige ich schon lange nicht mehr."
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor replies in a soft, arid voice,{/n} "But it is not a request. It is a command. And I am far past the point of humouring your pride and vanity."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Großinquisitor antwortet mit sanfter, freudloser Stimme:{/n} "Aber das war keine Bitte. Es war ein Befehl. Und Euren Hochmut und Eure Eitelkeit berücksichtige ich schon lange nicht mehr."

languages.text: {n}Lord Engizisyoncu, yumuşak ve kuru bir sesle yanıtlıyor.{/n} "Benim bir şey istediğim yok ki. Emrediyorum. Senin gururunu ve kibrini okşayacak raddeyi de çoktan geçtim."
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor replies in a soft, arid voice,{/n} "But it is not a request. It is a command. And I am far past the point of humouring your pride and vanity."
